Question: After arriving home at Kenwood, and finding this person with Ono, Cynthia left the house to stay with friends.
Hints: Recalling his reaction in July 1962 on learning that Cynthia was pregnant, this person said, "There's only one thing for it Cyn.
This person delighted in mocking Epstein for his homosexuality and for the fact that he was Jewish.
"I knew we were in trouble then", this person said later.
